sentences: Tema õde teadis, et ta ei saa unta enne kui sulgeda silmad ja minna voodisse.
Ta naeratus oli kuuldav maha minnes ja voodisse minemise ajaks.
context: The word 'voodisse' in Estonian translates to 'to bed,' 'into the bed,' or 'bedtime.' It is commonly used when referring to going to bed, either as an action of physically entering the bed or as a time-related term for bedtime. The context often involves sleep routines or instructions.
